2503.19885.title: Dynamics of Structured Complex-Valued Hopfield Neural Networks
2503.19885.paper_summary:
In this paper, we explore the dynamics of structured complex-valued Hopfield
neural networks (CvHNNs), which arise when the synaptic weight matrix possesses
specific structural properties. We begin by analyzing CvHNNs with a Hermitian
synaptic weight matrix and establish the existence of four-cycle dynamics in
CvHNNs with skew-Hermitian weight matrices operating synchronously.
Furthermore, we introduce two new classes of complex-valued matrices: braided
Hermitian and braided skew-Hermitian matrices. We demonstrate that CvHNNs
utilizing these matrix types exhibit cycles of length eight when operating in
full parallel update mode. Finally, we conduct extensive computational
experiments on synchronous CvHNNs, exploring other synaptic weight matrix
structures. The findings provide a comprehensive overview of the dynamics of
structured CvHNNs, offering insights that may contribute to developing improved
associative memory models when integrated with suitable learning rules.
2503.19885.paper_summary_zh: <paragraph>在本文中，我們探討了結構化複值 Hopfield 神經網絡 (CvHNNs) 的動態特性，這種動態特性出現在突觸權重矩陣具有特定結構屬性的情況下。我們首先分析了具有 Hermitian 突觸權重矩陣的 CvHNNs，並建立了在同步運作的具有 skew-Hermitian 權重矩陣的 CvHNNs 中存在四循環動態的特性。此外，我們引入了兩類新的複值矩陣：編織 Hermitian 矩陣和編織 skew-Hermitian 矩陣。我們證明了使用這些矩陣類型的 CvHNNs 在以全並行更新模式運作時會呈現八循環的特性。最後，我們對同步 CvHNNs 進行了廣泛的計算實驗，探討了其他突觸權重矩陣結構。這些研究結果提供了結構化 CvHNNs 動態特性的全面概述，並提供了在與合適的學習規則整合後可能有助於開發改進的關聯記憶體模型的見解。</paragraph>
